articles.author: Josh Funk
articles.title: Zoos hiding birds as avian flu spreads in North America - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Zoos across North America are moving their birds indoors and away from people and wildlife as they try to protect them from the highly contagious and potentially deadly avian influenza.
articles.content: OMAHA, Neb. (AP) Zoos across North America are moving their birds indoors and away from people and wildlife as they try to protect them from the highly contagious and potentially deadly avian influen… [+4498 chars]

articles.title: 메디포뉴스 - 메디포뉴스
articles.description: 바이엘은 자렐토(성분명 리바록사반)가 제71회 미국심장학회 연례학술대회(American Congress of Cardiology’s 71st Annual Scientific Session, ACC 2022)에서 만성 신장병(Chronic Kidney Disease, CKD)을 동반한 비판막성 심방세동(Non-Valvular Atrial Fibrillatio
